title: Strained Employer-Employee
description: We have a working relationship as employer and employee at the Public Dock at Riva dei Benefattori, but it's marked by significant distrust (-1.40875 trust score) despite a relatively strong connection (131.25 strength score). They are currently experiencing hunger-related productivity issues with another employee (Biagio Pugliese), which may be affecting our overall business operations and potentially our relationship.
